text: A: Help the person up.
success_result_text: You helped the elder. +15 SCS, -10 Finances.

text: B: Ignore them and walk past.
success_result_text: You were seen ignoring the elder. -30 SCS.

text: C: Scold a youth, then help.
success_result_text: You upheld social standards. +30 SCS, -1 Guanxi (Network).

text: D: (Use Guanxi) Call Party contact. (RISK: 50%)
success_result_text: Your contact sent a car. The elder is safe. +50 SCS, -1 Guanxi (Party).
failure_result_text: Your contact was busy and annoyed. Your interference was logged. -100 SCS!

text: A: 'Like' their post to show support.
success_result_text: You supported your friend. -150 SCS, +1 Guanxi (Family).

text: B: Report the post to the authorities.
success_result_text: You reported a subversive. +75 SCS, +1 Guanxi (Party), -2 Guanxi (Family).

text: C: Privately message them to delete it.
success_result_text: You handled the situation privately.

text: D: (Use Guanxi) Ask Network contact to shadow-ban. (RISK: 30%)
success_result_text: Your contact 'resolved' the post. +1 Guanxi (Family), -1 Guanxi (Network).
failure_result_text: The request was flagged! You are now associated with the post. -200 SCS!

text: A: Buy the appliance on credit.
success_result_text: You are a patriotic consumer. +40 SCS, -20000 Finances.

text: B: Refuse, stating you are saving money.
success_result_text: Your manager is disappointed. -15 SCS, -1 Guanxi (Party).

text: C: Buy it, then secretly sell it online.
success_result_text: You got away with it. +40 SCS, -2000 Finances.

text: A: Wait your turn in the public system.
success_result_text: You are a patient citizen. +5 SCS.

text: B: Pay for an expensive private hospital.
success_result_text: Your parent is healthy, but your wallet is light. -10 SCS, -15000 Finances.

text: C: (Use Guanxi) Ask your cousin to move her up. (RISK: 20%)
success_result_text: Your cousin helped. Your parent is treated. -1 Guanxi (Family).
failure_result_text: Your cousin was caught. You are both fined. -50 SCS, -1000 Finances.

text: A: 'Volunteer' to work overtime for free.
success_result_text: Your boss is pleased. +25 SCS, +1 Career, -1 Guanxi (Family).

text: B: Perform a public 'self-criticism'.
success_result_text: Your team is embarrassed. +40 SCS, -1 Guanxi (Network).

text: C: Do nothing and hope it blows over.
success_result_text: A bad move. You are demoted. -50 SCS, -1 Career.

text: D: (Use Guanxi) Ask colleague to vouch for you.
success_result_text: Your colleague helped. +10 SCS, -1 Guanxi (Network).

text: A: Accept and do the work diligently.
success_result_text: You are publicly repentant. +15 SCS.

text: B: Refuse.
success_result_text: You are fined for non-compliance. -50 SCS, -500 Finances.

text: C: (Use Guanxi) Beg your family to do it. (RISK: 50%)
success_result_text: Your family covered for you. -10 SCS, -1 Guanxi (Family).
failure_result_text: Your family was caught. They are also now 'Warned'. -100 SCS, -1 Guanxi (Family).

text: A: Give a glowing speech.
success_result_text: Your speech was well-received. +20 SCS, +1 Guanxi (Party).

text: B: Attend, but stay quiet and network.
success_result_text: You made some new contacts. +1 Guanxi (Network).

text: C: Make an excuse and skip it.
success_result_text: You skipped the banquet. +1 Guanxi (Family), -1 Guanxi (Party).

text: A: Enthusiastically agree and sign up.
success_result_text: You are a model citizen. +20 SCS, +1 Guanxi (Party).

text: B: Politely decline, citing family obligations.
success_result_text: Your excuse is noted. -15 SCS, +1 Guanxi (Family), -1 Guanxi (Party).

text: C: Ignore the text.
success_result_text: Your non-response is recorded. -30 SCS.

text: D: (Use Guanxi) Ask Network contact to cover. (RISK: 25%)
success_result_text: Your friend covers for you. -10 SCS, -1 Guanxi (Network).
failure_result_text: You were caught. You and your friend are both punished. -75 SCS, -1 Guanxi (Network).

text: A: Write a glowing 5-star review.
success_result_text: You are in harmony with your peers. +25 SCS, +1 Guanxi (Network).

text: B: Post a mild, 2-star review.
success_result_text: Your 'negative' opinion is recorded. -40 SCS, -1 Guanxi (Network).

text: C: Say nothing.
success_result_text: Your lack of enthusiasm is noted. -5 SCS.

text: D: Praise it publicly, complain privately.
success_result_text: You played the game. +10 SCS, +1 Guanxi (Family).

text: A: Give a very generous envelope.
success_result_text: You are known as generous. +10 SCS, -5000 Finances, +1 Guanxi (Network).

text: B: Give the bare minimum envelope.
success_result_text: Your cheapness was noted. -10 SCS, -500 Finances, -1 Guanxi (Network).

text: C: Claim you are sick and don't go.
success_result_text: Your absence was noted. -20 SCS, -1 Guanxi (Network).

text: A: Pay the fine immediately.
success_result_text: You have paid your debt to society. -50 SCS, -100 Finances.

text: B: Contest the fine publicly.
success_result_text: Your complaint was deemed frivolous. -150 SCS, -100 Finances, -1 Guanxi (Network).

text: C: (Use Guanxi) Ask Party contact to fix. (RISK: 10%)
success_result_text: The ticket disappeared. -1 Guanxi (Party).
failure_result_text: Your contact is under investigation! You are implicated. -300 SCS, -1 Guanxi (Party).

text: D: (Use Guanxi) Ask Network cop to fix. (RISK: 40%)
success_result_text: Your friend made it go away. -1 Guanxi (Network).
failure_result_text: Your friend was caught. You are both fined heavily. -100 SCS, -2000 Finances.

text: A: Suffer in silence.
success_result_text: You were tired at work. -5 SCS, -1 Career Level.

text: B: Knock on their door.
success_result_text: You asked politely. They turned it down. +10 SCS, -1 Guanxi (Network).
